title: Life in a Mediaeval City, Illustrated by York in the XVth Century
creator: Edwin Benson
description: LibriVox recording of Life in a Mediaeval City, Illustrated by York in the XVth Century, by Edwin Benson. Read by Peter Yearsley. A short and gentle overview of mediaeval life in a large city. It lightly covers the class structure of society, local government, guilds, pageantry and punishment. The author has an easy, rhythmic style which leaves the reader wanting to find out more. (Summary by Peter Yearsley) M4B audiobook of complete book For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobook; history; mediaeval; medieval; York; class; guilds; pageantry; punishment
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
